name: Puzzle Wood 88 Fun
description:
Puzzle Wood 88 Fun is brain development puzzle game that you can enjoy comfortably.
It is a simple puzzle game where you score points by combining various blocks without any spaces.

HOW TO PLAY
- Drag the blocks to move them.
- Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
- Blocks can't be rotated.
- Don't worry! No time limits!
